data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The British agreed to depart from their forts around the Great Lakes, and the United States-Canada boundary had to be re-adjusted. Numerous pre-Revolutionary debts ____ liquidated, and ____ British ____ their West Indies ____ to American trade. Most ____, ____ treaty ____ war ____ Great Britain and ____ brought a decade ____ prosperous ____. The ____ angered ____ French ____ became a central ____ in ____ political ____. Relations with France deteriorated after the treaty was signed, leaving succeeding president John Adams with the prospect of war.
data.partBlankContent: The British agreed to depart from their forts around the Great Lakes, and the United States-Canada boundary had to be re-adjusted. Numerous pre-Revolutionary debts we__ liquidated, and t__ British ope___ their West Indies colo____ to American trade. Most impor______, t__ treaty del____ war wi__ Great Britain and ins____ brought a decade o_ prosperous tr___. The tre___ angered t__ French a__ became a central is___ in ma__ political deb____. Relations with France deteriorated after the treaty was signed, leaving succeeding president John Adams with the prospect of war.
data.answer: 英国同意离开五大湖周围的堡垒，美国和加拿大的边界不得不重新调整。许多独立前的债务被清偿，英国人向美国开放了他们的西印度群岛殖民地。最重要的是，该条约延缓了与英国的战争，反而带来了长达十年的繁荣贸易。该条约激怒了法国，并成为许多政治辩论的中心议题。条约签署后，美国与法国的关系恶化，留给继任者约翰·亚当斯(John Adams)战争的前景。
